name: Soleil
description:
NOTE: Make sure hardware acceleration is enabled and that the browser is in 100% zoom before going fullscreen or weird scaling issues occurAlso, READ THE CONTROLS!SoleilLudum Dare Game for LD38: It's a Small World

Save a solar system without a sun! Though this game itself doesn't have much content, it was still fun (and very stressful) to make, so I hope you go through the same amount of agony fun I did.

Made with the cooperation of:

  • Sean Seo - Music
  • Klekky - Made a Hotdog
